ARABIC: هَٰذَا ذِكْرٌ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is a Reminder. Those who have taqwa will have a good Homecoming:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is a commemoration. Surely for those who take heed for themselves is an excellent place of return --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This was a remembrance. An excellent retreat awaits the God-fearing
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Such is their noble story. The pious ones will certainly have the best place to return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is an advice; and indeed for the pious is an excellent abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is a Reminder. And verily, for those who have Taqwa is a good final return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is a reminder; and most surely there is an excellent resort for those who guard (against evil),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is a Remembrance; and for the godfearing is a fair resort,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This is a reminder. And lo! for those who ward off (evil) is a happy journey's end,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This is a Reminder. The righteous shall have a good place to return to:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This is an admonition, and verily for the God-feoring is a happy retreat:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is a Reminder, and indeed the Godwary have a good destination:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This is a Message (of admonition): and verily, for the righteous, is a beautiful Place of (Final) Return,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This is a Reminder, and verily, for the Muttaqun (pious and righteous persons - see V. 2:2) is a good final return (Paradise),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is a Reminder, and indeed for the cautious is a fine return,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is a reminder. The devout will have a good place of return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This is a reminder. And indeed, for the righteous is a good place of return
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:49] This is a remembrance, of them, [made] by [the mention of] fair praise [of them] here; and indeed for the God-fearing, who comprise them, there will truly be a fair return, in the Hereafter —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This is a reminder) this is a remembrance of the righteous; it is also said that this means: this Qur'an contains the events of the people of old as well as of future generations. (And lo! for those who ward off (evil)) disbelief, idolatry and indecent acts (is a happy journey's end) a happy return in the Hereafter,
